original_text: I have been careful to obey his commands. His words are more important to me than my food. I have been careful to obey his commands.
korean_text: 내가 그의 입술의 명령을 어기지 아니하고 정한 음식보다 그의 입의 말씀을 귀히 여겼도다

sentences.original_text: I have been careful to obey his commands.
His words are more important to me than my food.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말씀은 나의 음식보다 더 중요합니다.

sentences.original_text: I have been careful to obey his commands.
